text: Brigid Kemmerer Brigid Kemmerer is an American author of young adult fiction. Kemerer was born in Omaha, Nebraska. She worked in the finance industry before becoming a full-time writer. Her book A Curse So Dark and Lonely, an adaptation of Beauty and the Beast, was a New York Times bestseller and received a starred review from Publishers Weekly. More Than We Can Tell received a starred review from School Library Journal. == Works == * Thicker Than Water (2015) * Call It What You Want (2019) * Defy the Night (2021) === Cursebreakers series === * A Curse So Dark and Lonely (2019) * A Heart So Fierce and Broken (2020) * A Vow So Bold and Deadly (2021) === Letters to the Lost series === * Letters to the Lost (2017) * More Than We Can Tell (2018) === Elemental series === * Elemental (#0.5) (2012) * Storm (#1) (2012) * Fearless (#1.5) (2012) * Spark (#2) (2012) * Breathless (#2.5) (2013) * Spirit (#3) (2013) * Secret (#4) (2014) * Sacrifice (#5) (2014) == References == == External links == * Official website * Q&A; with Publishers Weekly * Interview with The Children's Book Review Category:Living people Category:Year of birth missing (living people) Category:Writers from Omaha, Nebraska
